about_the_game:
After the catastrophes caused by deforestation on Earth, the world is no longer the same. Deforestation has caused the extinction of almost all species.
The trees that survived began to produce pollen that contaminated anyone who breathed it, causing terrible mutations. The humans who survived were sent to bases commanded by a greater ruler, called "Rocom". This cruel and sarcastic individual makes everyone work in exchange for housing and security, but something goes wrong at one of the bases: contaminated air was released into the rooms while everyone slept, resulting in a mass mutation.
Monsters everywhere, lights out, everything is in chaos now, it's up to the player to find out the reason for all the events and try to get out of this terrible place.
Visibility in some places is very low and the player will have some features to light your way.
The player will need to be cold-blooded to eliminate all enemies in his path to unlock each of the 50 floors and find his family, in this, which was once a simple building, but now it has become a huge labyrinth.

Main Features:


- Fast and accurate combat, walk in 8 directions to choose the best angle to perform your attacks
- 2 selectable characters: one female and one male
- Attack both from afar and up close
- the Player will have a flashlight to light his way but be careful with his battery
- Use the emergency beacon as a last resort to briefly illuminate dark areas
- Use dash to dodge enemies and speed up your movement on the map
- Find power-ups to increase your character's stats
- Understand the whole story through the npcs found on the way
- Eliminate all enemies from one floor to unlock the portal to the next
- You will encounter several traps on your way
- Stay tuned as there will be many surprises to make your life difficult in Green Alert

highlighted.name: A light at the end of the tunnel
The end and a fresh start
